title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Strengthening: Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Using Reflective Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and primary education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can complete over 80% of elementary mathematics instructional design tasks through three-stage reflective learning activities (problem recognition → solution exploration → reflective evaluation)
Participants can identify and derive improvements for over three critical issues in the instructional design process using scaffolding tools (checklists, case analysis, feedback frameworks)
Participants can enhance qualitative elements (clarity, creativity, systematicity) of instructional design outputs by over 20% through peer review and self-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
